translation.en: I'm on the surface. I'm on the surface.
The sun!
I looked at the sun! I'll go blind!
Wait, I can still see.
I can't be here. I can't be here. I can't be here.
Out of my way, rocks!
Dad! Can you hear me?
Of course not. He could be miles away.
translation.es: Por supuesto que no. Él podría estar a kilómetros de distancia.

translation.en: OK.  You can do this, Kipo.
translation.es: De acuerdo. Puedes hacer esto, Kipo.

translation.en: You got this.
Humans lived on the surface for thousands of years.
translation.es: Los humanos vivieron en la superficie durante miles de años.

translation.en: You can handle a few minutes up here.
translation.es: Puedes aguantar unos minutos aquí arriba.

translation.en: You just have to find your way home.
translation.es: Solo tienes que encontrar el camino a casa.

translation.en: Flowers.
A lot bigger than they are in books.
translation.es: Mucho más grandes que en los libros.

translation.en: ♪ Up on top, on my own ♪
♪ A human girl so far from home ♪
translation.es: Una chica humana tan lejos de casa

translation.en: ♪ The flowers are big ♪
♪ The bees are weird ♪
♪ It's dangerous ♪
♪ Just like I feared ♪
♪ On the surface world ♪
translation.es: En el mundo de la superficie

translation.en: Stay away!
Hmm... Let's see, the current took me left, then right.
translation.es: A ver, la corriente me llevó a la izquierda, luego a la derecha.

translation.en: And then there was the long part.
translation.es: Y luego estaba la parte larga.

translation.en: And the... And the short part.
And then the loop- dee- do.
And then I went way over here, so, my home must be in this direction.
translation.es: Y luego fui por aquí, así que mi hogar debe estar en esta dirección.

translation.en: Or was it left, then loop- dee- do?
translation.es: ¿O fue a la izquierda, y luego el espiral?

translation.en: Or... or... loop- dee- do, then left?
translation.es: O... ¿el espiral, y luego la izquierda?

translation.en: Who are you, little one?
You're adorable.
Uh, sorry.
Didn't expect you to come with extra eyes.
translation.es: No esperaba que vinieras con ojos extra.

translation.en: I'm a friend.
Oh! You come with an extra pair of everything!
translation.es: ¡Vienes con un par extra de todo!

translation.en: I only have two legs. So boring.
translation.es: Solo tengo dos piernas. Muy aburrido.

translation.en: - I have to pet you. -
Wait! Come back!
You can run, pig. But I will find you, and I will pet you.
translation.es: Puedes correr, cerdo. Pero te encontraré y te acariciaré.

translation.en: I somehow feel like I've been wearing you my whole life.
translation.es: De alguna forma, siento que te he estado usando toda mi vida.

translation.en: Piggy!
I can help you with that.
We have vending machines like this in my burrow.
translation.es: Tenemos máquinas expendedoras como esta en mi madriguera.

translation.en: I know all the tricks.
There's a wire back here.
If I could just get to it.
translation.es: Si tan solo pudiera llegar a él.

translation.en: That works, too.
Whoa! You were hungry, weren't you?
Hey, wanna try something fun?
You ready?
Yeah!
Humans from the old world.
This is a school!
I go to school, too.
translation.es: Yo también voy a la escuela.

translation.en: Underground with lots of other kids.
translation.es: Una subterránea con muchos otros chicos.

translation.en: No windows, though. My father teaches there.
translation.es: Sin embargo, no hay ventanas. Mi padre enseña allí.

translation.en: Kipo, how many light years are in a parsec?
translation.es: Kipo, ¿cuántos años luz hay en un parsec?

translation.en: Although, a lot of good that does me up here.
translation.es: Aunque no me sirve de mucho aquí arriba.

translation.en: My whole life they taught us the surface was this horrible place.
translation.es: Toda mi vida nos enseñaron que la superficie era un lugar horrible.

translation.en: - But look at you. -
You look just like these dumplings my dad makes.
translation.es: Te pareces a esos bollos que mi padre prepara.

translation.en: They're called mandu.
That's it! I'm gonna call you Mandu.
translation.es: ¡Eso es! Te voy a llamar Mandu.

translation.en: I'm gonna get you!
- - I'm gonna get you, Mandu!
Mandu, I have to pet this bunny, now.
translation.es: Mandu, tengo que acariciar a este conejito, ahora.

translation.en: It's gonna be OK.
Hi, there. Aren't you fluffy.
Oh, you like that.
Oh! There's another one.
OK, OK! Everyone wait your turn.
You're all so soft, but there's only one of me.
translation.es: Todos ustedes son muy suaves, pero yo soy una sola.

translation.en: And that must be the mother.
translation.es: Y esa debe ser la madre.

translation.en: Mandu!
Mandu!
Can you talk, mute?
I'm no barbarian. If a mute can talk, it's not chow.
translation.es: No soy bárbara. Si un mutante habla, no es alimento.

translation.en: All I need to hear is one little yes.
translation.es: Todo lo que necesito escuchar es un pequeño sí.

translation.en: - - A human?
Sorry, but a girl's gotta eat.
translation.es: Lo siento, pero una chica tiene que comer.

translation.en: Wait!
I was wondering when you were gonna come out of there.
translation.es: Me preguntaba cuándo saldrías de allí.

translation.en: You're human! On the surface.
You don't miss a thing, do you?
- - Wait. You can't eat my friend.
translation.es: Espera. No puedes comerte a mi amiga.

translation.en: If you want a bacon sandwich, go catch your own pig.
translation.es: Si quieres un sándwich de tocino, ve por tu propio cerdo.

translation.en: I already called dibs on this one.
- Mandu is no sandwich! - She's about to be.
translation.es: - ¡Mandu no es un sándwich! - Está a punto de serlo.

translation.en: Say, your staff is so pointy.
translation.es: Vaya, tu báculo es tan puntiagudo.

translation.en: - Where'd you get it from? - Off a giant scorpion.
translation.es: - ¿De dónde lo sacaste? - De un escorpión gigante.

translation.en: It was trespassing in my camp.
- - Oh, no, you don't!
- Hey! Run, Mandu! - Let go!
What is wrong with you?
Now we're both out of a meal.
How can you eat her? She's adorable!
I've eaten plenty of adorable.
And there's lots more adorable that's tried to eat me.
translation.es: Y hay muchas otras más adorables que trataron de comerme.

translation.en: Do you have any hand sanitizer?
You must not be from around here.
translation.es: No debes ser de por aquí.

translation.en: Are you one of those underground mole people?
You've heard of us!
I didn't think there were any humans left up here anymore.
translation.es: Ya no creía que hubiera más humanos aquí arriba.

translation.en: For your lost lunch.
Listen, I'm trying to find my way home.
translation.es: Escucha, estoy tratando de encontrar mi camino a casa.

translation.en: You clearly look like you grew up around here.
translation.es: Claramente parece que creciste por aquí.

translation.en: Maybe you could help me find...
it.
Kipo. My name's Kipo.
And... and I really need your help right now.
translation.es: Y realmente necesito tu ayuda ahora mismo.

translation.en: You're not gone? That's annoying.
translation.es: ¿No te has ido? Eso es molesto.

translation.en: Look, there was a mute- quake.
A lot of people I care about could be hurt.
translation.es: Mucha gente que me importa podría estar lastimada.

translation.en: I really need to get home.
Not my problem.
Hey. Hey!
First lesson of the surface: Up here, you don't shout like that.
translation.es: Primera lección de la superficie: aquí arriba, no gritas así.

translation.en: It's called ringing the dinner bell.
translation.es: Se llama tocar el timbre de la cena.

translation.en: Free advice.
Hey, you, wolf girl!
Yeah! You, walking away from me!
I'm still talking to you!
Fine. I don't need you anyway.
translation.es: Bien. No te necesito, de todos modos.

translation.en: Oh, hi. You look friendly.
That's your last freebie.
translation.es: Esa es tu última ayuda gratis.

translation.en: Fine. I'll just go this way instead.
translation.es: Bien. Voy a ir por este camino, entonces.

translation.en: Really? You're just gonna walk right into Death Ivy?
translation.es: ¿De verdad? ¿Vas a caminar directamente hacia la hiedra mortal?

translation.en: Whoa.
You're not gonna last five minutes.
translation.es: No vas a durar ni cinco minutos.

translation.en: Look, I'll help you get home.
translation.es: Mira, te ayudaré a llegar a casa.

translation.en: But once you're back, I'm out.
translation.es: Pero, una vez que vuelvas, no cuentes conmigo.

translation.en: - Up here, I work alone. Got it? - Oh, thank you!
No hugging.
I knew you were a good person.
translation.es: Sabía que eras una buena persona.

translation.en: Hey, I just realized I don't know your name.
translation.es: Oye, me acabo de dar cuenta de que no sé tu nombre.

translation.en: - No talking! - Uh, OK.
translation.es: ¡Nada de hablar! De acuerdo. Te llamaré Lobezna, entonces.

translation.en: I'll just call you Wolf, then.
translation.es: De acuerdo. Te llamaré Lobezna, entonces.

translation.en: I've already been calling you that in my head.
translation.es: Ya te he estado llamando así en mi cabeza.

translation.en: At first we thought it was a mute passing overhead.
translation.es: Al principio, pensamos que era un mutante que pasaba por encima.

translation.en: I mean, that happens all the time, right?
translation.es: Quiero decir, eso pasa todo el tiempo, ¿verdad?

translation.en: We learned a long time ago to anchor all tall furniture.
translation.es: Aprendimos hace mucho tiempo a anclar todos los muebles altos.

translation.en: But this one was, like, an earthquake. I can't imagine how big it was.
translation.es: Pero este fue como un terremoto. No puedo imaginar lo grande que era.

translation.en: It made an entire cliff fall... while I was on it.
translation.es: Hizo que todo un acantilado cayera mientras estaba sobre él.

translation.en: And then, I landed in the water supply tube and nearly drowned.
translation.es: Y, luego, aterricé en el tubo de suministro de agua y casi me ahogo.

translation.en: Sounds like a Tuesday.
Listen, Kipo, was it?
Lesson two of the surface: Don't ever tell anyone that story.
translation.es: Lección dos de la superficie: nunca le cuentes esa historia a nadie.

translation.en: It could be very dangerous if people know you're from a burrow.
translation.es: Podría ser muy peligroso si la gente sabe que eres de una madriguera.

translation.en: And lesson three of the surface: Up here, you never pass up a meal.
translation.es: Y la tercera lección de la superficie: aquí arriba, nunca dejas pasar una comida.

translation.en: Crispy on the outside, chewy in the center.
translation.es: Crujiente por fuera, masticable por dentro.

translation.en: Can you tell me anything about your burrow that might help us find it?
translation.es: ¿Puedes decirme algo sobre tu madriguera que pueda ayudarnos a encontrarla?

translation.en: Oh, well, there's the underground irrigation system...
translation.es: Bueno, ahí está el sistema de riego subterráneo,

translation.en: which is underground.
Oh, wait! The Clover!
How could I forget the Clover?
We live under this barrier called The Great Clover.
translation.es: Vivimos bajo una barrera llamada El Gran Trébol.

translation.en: I've never actually seen it, but we use it as our city emblem.
translation.es: Nunca la he visto, pero la usamos como el emblema de nuestra ciudad.

translation.en: Hmm. I may know what that is.
translation.es: Puede que sepa lo que es eso.

translation.en: We'll make camp here for the night.
For the night... out here?
Uh, my dad must be really worried about me right now, so...
translation.es: Mi papá debe estar realmente preocupado por mí ahora, así que...

translation.en: Uh, did you hear that? Because I definitely did.
translation.es: ¿Escuchaste eso? Porque definitivamente yo sí lo escuché.

translation.en: It feels like something we should worry about.
translation.es: Se siente como algo de lo que deberíamos preocuparnos.

translation.en: So many sparkles! I was not prepared.
Why would humans stay underground
translation.es: ¿Por qué los humanos se quedarían bajo tierra,

translation.en: when every night they could look up and see this?
translation.es: cuándo cada noche podrían mirar hacia arriba y ver esto?

translation.en: Yeah, it's a real paradise.
That must be the Big Dipper! It's part of Ursa Major.
translation.es: ¡Ese debe ser el Carro! Es parte de la Osa Mayor.

translation.en: I'm kind of an astronomy buff even though I've never seen a sky before.
translation.es: Soy una aficionada a la astronomía, aunque nunca antes había visto el cielo.

translation.en: Ooh! And that bright one, that's Polaris!
You see the one that doesn't make any noise?
Well, none of them make... Oh.
translation.es: Bueno, ninguna de ellas lo hace...

translation.en: OK. I'll be quiet.
You get sleep.
Aries! That's my birth sign.
translation.es: ¡Aries! Ese es mi signo de nacimiento.

translation.en: I've always wanted to see it!
It's supposed to be a ram if you connect the dots.
translation.es: Parece un carnero, si conectas los puntos.

translation.en: I guess you can kinda see it if you squint right--
translation.es: Supongo que puedes verlo si entornas los ojos...

translation.en: - Kipo! - Oh, right.
Anything that looks useful, take.
translation.es: Cualquier cosa que parezca útil, tómala.

translation.en: October 23rd, 2020.
Yeah, it's expired by about 200 years.
translation.es: Sí, ha caducado hace unos 200 años.

translation.en: - Found it! - Spot remover?
That's for getting out shirt stains.
translation.es: Eso es para quitar manchas de una camisa.

translation.en: No offense, yours may need a full spin cycle.
translation.es: Sin ofender, pero la tuya necesita un rociado completo.

translation.en: Mega Bunny.
It's a good thing we're inside--
- Whoa! - Definitely a Mega Bunny.
I saw that same Mega Bunny earlier.
translation.es: Vi ese mismo mega conejo antes.

translation.en: I named her Rabbecka. The little ones are so cuddly!
translation.es: La llamé Rebeca. ¡Los pequeños son tan tiernos!

translation.en: You touched the babies?
Why did you touch the babies?
Don't you know you can't touch the babies?!
translation.es: ¿No sabes que no puedes tocar a los bebés?

translation.en: But they were so cute.
Aisle six, baking goods. Aisle seven, drinks.
translation.es: Pasillo seis, repostería. Pasillo siete, bebidas.

translation.en: Aisle eight, bingo!
Pretty sure you got the baby scent off me.
translation.es: Seguro ya me sacaste todo el olor a bebé.

translation.en: You can't be too careful.
translation.es: No se puede ser demasiado cuidadoso.

translation.en: Huh? Oh, all out. Oh, thank goodness!
It's a good thing I found this second bottle.
translation.es: Qué bueno que encontré una segunda botella.

translation.en: You've gotta be kidding me!
- - This one's Summer Rain.
translation.es: Esta es como una lluvia de verano.

translation.en: That is way better than taking the stairs!
translation.es: ¡Eso es mucho mejor que subir por las escaleras!

translation.en: If you run into anything, act like you're from the surface.
translation.es: Si te topas con cualquier... cosa, actúa como si fueras de la superficie.

translation.en: From the surface. Got it.
Uh, what are you doing?
I'm from the surface, where life is hard.
translation.es: Soy de la superficie, donde la vida es dura.

translation.en: You gotta be tough as nails.
Iron and fire... wearing dead animals.
translation.es: Hierro y fuego... vistiendo animales muertos.

translation.en: Good. You're catching on.
This is my angry surface face.
Hmm.  Whoa, what's that?
There's so much to see when you're not in a cave!
translation.es: ¡Hay tanto que ver cuando no estás en una cueva!

translation.en: Focus, Kipo.
That must be it!
It looks just like the clover in our emblem.
translation.es: Se parece al trébol en nuestro emblema.

translation.en: Wow. So, that's my home.
It's half a day's walk from here,
translation.es: Está a medio día caminando desde aquí.

translation.en: but we'll have to get over Skyscraper Ridge.
translation.es: Pero tendremos que superar la cordillera rascacielos.

translation.en: - That looks dangerous. - It is.
translation.es: - Eso se ve peligroso. - Lo es.

translation.en: I'm really sticking my neck out for you. And for what?
translation.es: Realmente me estoy arriesgando por ti. ¿Y para qué?

translation.en: I wish I knew how to repay you.
Or if you wanted to come stay with me,
translation.es: O, si quisieras venir y quedarte conmigo,

translation.en: I'm sure there'd be a place for you in my burrow.
translation.es: estoy segura de que habría un lugar para ti en mi madriguera.

translation.en: And go all soft and mushy like the rest of you mole people?
translation.es: ¿Y ser suave y blando como el resto de ustedes, gente topo?

translation.en: No, thanks.
Humans.
My shirt!
It won't come out!
It's setting!
Careful! That's one of the Mod Frogs.
translation.es: ¡Con cuidado! Esa es una de las ranas mod.

translation.en: You do not wanna mess with them.
You're a talking frog!
I mean, I've seen tons of talking frogs before...
translation.es: Quiero decir, he visto toneladas de ranas que hablan antes...

translation.en: that wear suits.
No... No biggie.
What my friend here means to say is, we have this!
translation.es: Lo que mi amiga quiere decir es... ¡que tenemos esto!

translation.en: Spot remover! Give it to me!
If you let us go.
Look, this is my private office.
translation.es: Mira, esta es mi oficina privada.

translation.en: Was there an enjoy the view sign on my door?
translation.es: ¿Había un cartel de disfruta de la vista en mi puerta?

translation.en: I think not.
We're Mega Bunny hunters. We were just scouting.
translation.es: Somos cazadores de mega conejos. Solo estábamos explorando.

translation.en: Just give me the spot remover.
translation.es: Solo dame el removedor de manchas.

translation.en: Then I'll decide what to do with you.
translation.es: Entonces, decidiré qué hacer con ustedes.

translation.en: Oh, thank... Huh?
Mega Bunny hunters. Right.
Looked more like a burrow girl to me.
translation.es: Parecía más una chica de madriguera.

translation.en: This does not get old.
Lesson five on the surface: Looking up... gets you killed.
translation.es: Lección cinco en la superficie: Al mirar hacia arriba... te matan.

translation.en: Mandu! You came back!
Here, girl!
Something's wrong.
Yeah, you're pointing a nightmare stick at a tiny pig.
translation.es: Sí, estás apuntando un palo afilado a un cerdo pequeño.

translation.en: How do you expect the poor thing to react?
I'm not the one who spooked her.
translation.es: No soy yo quien la asustó.

translation.en: Oh, burrow girl! I figured out where you're from.
translation.es: ¡Chica de madriguera! Me di cuenta de dónde eres.

translation.en: Shocker... a burrow!
You could lead us to the mother lode of humans.
translation.es: Podrías llevarnos a la guarida de los humanos.

translation.en: Ah, just a pig.
- - Eh, at least now we have a snack.
translation.es: - Al menos, ahora tenemos una merienda. - No.

translation.en: I won't let them take her.
translation.es: No dejaré que se la lleven.

translation.en: And risk our necks for a mute?
See, this is why I work alone.
If you like to be alone so bad, maybe you should be.
translation.es: Si te gusta estar sola, tal vez deberías estarlo.

translation.en: Put the pig down right now!
Burrow girl, there you are.
translation.es: Chica de la madriguera, ahí estás.

translation.en: Uh... That pig is a bloodthirsty killer.
translation.es: Ese cerdo es un asesino sediento de sangre.

translation.en: - She'll tear you limb from limb. - Mm, yeah. I'll take my chances.
translation.es: Te arrancará las extremidades. Sí. Me arriesgaré.

translation.en: Wolf! You came back!
Yep.
Is he dead?
No, but when he wakes up, he'll have a bad headache...
translation.es: No, pero cuando se despierte, tendrá un fuerte dolor de cabeza.

translation.en: and possibly some memory loss.
We'll hole up here.
Normally, at night, I'd be at home doing my homework.
translation.es: Normalmente, por la noche, estaría en casa haciendo mi tarea.

translation.en: Eating a muffin.
Not running away from homicidal frogs!
Oh... Oh, my head.
I... Wait a minute, why are you following me?
translation.es: Yo... Espera un minuto, ¿por qué me sigues?

translation.en: Uh, Jamack, we're looking for those humans.
translation.es: Jamack, estamos buscando a esos humanos.

translation.en: Oh, yeah, right. Yeah, just... duh.
Let's... let's get back to that then.
Since we've had our first fight and makeup,
translation.es: Desde que tuvimos nuestra primera pelea y nos arreglamos,

translation.en: that makes us officially sisters.
- Don't. - Uh, right.
There's a baby here.
Why is there a baby here?
We have to shut that thing up.
OK, we really need you to hush, little baby.
translation.es: Está bien, realmente necesitamos que hagas silencio, pequeño bebé.

translation.en: I'll put him to sleep.
There's a slight chance this'll kill him.
translation.es: Hay una pequeña posibilidad de que esto lo mate.

translation.en: Don't you dare!
A mute? You gotta be kidding me!
It's still a baby!
Check every room!
Do you know any grub nursery rhymes?
